    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RoomList()
      creates an empty users.UserList
      RoomList(Room room) 
      RoomList(Room[] rooms)
      A constructor with a room array where all rooms get added to the room list

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Room room)
      This Method adds a single room to the roomlist and increase its length by 1
      Room addNewRoom(User joining_user)
      creates and returns a new room and let the given user join this room
      void clearAll()
      This method removes all rooms from the roomlist and sets the length attribute to 0.
      org.json.JSONArray getInterfaceRoomList()
      returns a JSONArray with the room_id and the number of seats of every room

      This method is used to get a room by its index in the roomlist

      Lookup up for a room in the roomlist by its room id.

      This method is used to get a room.
      Room getRoomByUser(User user) 
      java.util.List<Room> getRooms() 
      void removeRoom(Room room)
      Removes a room from the roomlist and decrease the length attribute by 1

      • getRoomBySession

        public Room getRoomBySession(javax.websocket.Session session)
        This method is used to get a room. It checks up the websession of all users in the room to be equal to the given session parameter
        Parameters:
        session - lookup parameter.
        Returns:
        a single room with a user in it with the given session.

      • getRoomByRoomId

        public Room getRoomByRoomId(int room_id)
        Lookup up for a room in the roomlist by its room id.
        Parameters:
        room_id - lookup parameter
        Returns:
        the room with the given parameter
